TopicTitle: The Asteroid Sentinels: A KSP Graphic Novel (Series 8 Episode 10: Finale!)

Articles.Content: [@SaturnianBlue](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/141267-saturnianblue/) congrats on finishing your story, and best of luck on your next one

*"Err... Mortimer, about that....."*

I am SO glad Mort got what was coming before the end! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif ":sticktongue:")

I'm sad to see it end... this was great. But I look forward to your next adventure!  ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

> 
> 
> 4 minutes ago, Just Jim said:
> 
> 
> *"Err... Mortimer, about that....."*
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I am SO glad Mort got what was coming before the end! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif ":sticktongue:")
> 
> 
> 
> I'm sad to see it end... this was great. But I look forward to your next adventure!  ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")
> 

Can't let Mort get away unharmed can you?

As for the next few stories I've got some ideas, but in the mean time I might finally get around to doing a Behind-the-scenes/Analysis/Goofs thread for this series.

Congratulations Blue! It can be even harder to finish a series than to start one, and you wrapped this up neatly and well. I haven't always commented, but I have seen you grow significantly as both a writer and a graphic artist since you started this comic way back then--and I know you'll apply what you learned to your next endeavors ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
Congrats on finishing a great story! Looking forward to seeing what you have next. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

...And so they lived happily ever after.

Except the asteroid, I mean.

I can see Mort's erased smile, replaced by a frown. It took plenty of close looking, though.

Well, maybe also Mort. He's not the easiest to satisfy after all. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") 

You found the smile! It's definitely one of those "good enough" solutions. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

I've created two companion threads for this series.

[The first](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/158550-crafts-from-the-asteroid-sentinels-all-of-them-released/)is an expansive list of crafts from the Asteroid Sentinels in case you wanted to download them.

[The second](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/158500-thoughts-and-ramblings-on-the-asteroid-sentinels-and-future-works/) is a thread of reflections, thoughts, and behind-the-scenes of this series. It's still being updated, since I still have a few more things to fill out.
